== Lorenzo Hernandez Garcia-Hierro ==

Lorenzo is:
* the Hardened Debian (http://www.debian-hardened.org) project manager and lead developer.
* the developer and maintainer of the NSA SELinux 2.4 backport.
* the developer of vSecurity and other Linux Security Modules.
* an old member of the FSF/GNU Project webmasters board.
* the UbuntuHardened project founder and leader
* the lead developer for SELinux deployment within Ubuntu
* one of the administrators of ubuntu-hardened@lists.ubuntu.com

You can find more information at http://www.tuxedo-es.org ;)
